title: Federated Learning-Based Security Strategies for Protecting Medical IoT Data

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical information systems, fundamental data security concepts, and IoT device operation experience
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate managers aiming to strengthen data protection capabilities in medical IoT environments. Requires practical training linked to real-world business cases

learning_goals: One can explain the data protection mechanisms of Federated Learning (FL) in a medical IoT environment
One can perform model updates on real datasets by applying the noise adjustment technique of the PAFL algorithm
One can assess privacy breach risks and propose mitigation strategies in a distributed learning environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
